item.title: Self-care
item.description: Sorry i haven't been posting lately. I've been taking a self care break. I get really engulfed in creating art and stuff to the point I'll start neglecting basic things for weeks to months. (Pretty sure it's a symptom of being bipolar) so right now I'm just being present in my everyday life. I hope to one day be able to balance these things. Thank you for understanding!

item.title: Color Swap
item.description:
Pixel Art Color Changer

Want my graphics in your favorite color instead of my favorite color ?

Well I made a little tool for that!

go try it!

It's a color swap tool! It only targets specific colors, since it for pixel art. So trying it on images with anti aliasing wouldn't be practical

item.title: Poor Things
item.description: I love how the reviews for the movie "Poor Things" are about 50/50 with either 5 stars or 1. Those who give it 1 being people who can only see a story at face value, and have a hard time with uncomfortable visuals/situations. With my full awareness of how pretentious I might come off to someone like that; All the 5 stars are given by people who clearly have a higher level of thinking , empathy , and understanding. Not just of themselves but of the world around them and how those to things work it tandem. There is so much I can say about this movie that nobody should be suprised if I don't write an entire breakdown of it one day.

item.title: Status.cafe
item.description: I finally made a status.cafe

item.title: Deckonomicon
item.description:
I did it!

I actually made a pixel clique!

So I completed the trading card pixel clique I was brainstorming! I named it Deckonomicon which I felt was really fitting for my site haha. if you join, please leave a link in my guestbook!

item.title: A few updates
item.description: I added some cool freakin' hands to my home page, and some drippy slime div boxes under the graphics tab.

item.title: Ars Goetia
item.description: Ahh, so I made a page that list all 72 demons in the Lesser Keys Of Solomon. It has Rank, seal metals, and descriptions. along with a filter system. Its not perfect yet but it exist lmfao.

item.title: Omg game changer
item.description:
xml post generator

So, since my blog / rss feed on here has to be manually updated, I made me a little xml snippet generator! Because 9 times out of 10 I fuck up the syntax on a new post and its just annoying.

I gave it FEATURES

  • Direct image upload using imgbb
  • live preview
  • post templates
  • drafting

but.. the layout is FUCKED right now. but after I get it pretty I'll definitely need to share the source code

item.title: zanpo
item.description: I'm sitting here thinking about Zanpo. I feel like I should really write something about it somewhere before the memory of it completely gets whipped from the internet. I've never seen anyone else mention it and it's been offline for almost 20 years now. It was so cool and quirky and it's definitely a website I would love a revival of.

item.title: Darbie!
item.description: Yay! Happy to show off the latest addition on the dollz page

item.title: BREAKTHAT Poetry
item.description: I like to spread my poetry across random corners of the internet once in a blue moon. If you ever find it, tell me about it.

item.title: New Ko-fi Shop Launch
item.description: I'm excited to announce the launch of my new Ko-fi shop! Check it out and support my work if you can.

item.title: Plinko Game Promotion
Personal Reflections
item.description: I don't know why I always try to make a blog like I'll actually open up when I use it. The truth is, I am such a reserved person when it comes to what goes on in the important parts of my mind. My friends would be very surprised by that because I seemingly tell allâ€”which I kind of do, but only at the appropriate moments. It's hard to find the appropriate moments inside of a blog. I'll keep trying.
